snippet: The Brooklyn Museum exhibition “The Rise of Sneaker Culture” chronicles the history and fashion influence of a once-lowly footwear item.
abstract: Exhibition set to open at Brooklyn Museum includes more than 150 pairs of sneakers by Puma Clydes, Converse All Stars, Christian Louboutin, Raf Simmons and more.
lead_paragraph: The Brooklyn Museum exhibition “The Rise of Sneaker Culture” chronicles the history and fashion influence of a once-lowly footwear item.

headline.main: For Sneakerheads, an Exhibit That Chronicles the Culture of Their Beloved Shoes
